請在C:\myJava\exercise\ch11\pack2>下進行如下編譯
C:\myJava\exercise\ch11\pack2>javac packb\IFullCompute.java
C:\myJava\exercise\ch11\pack2>javac packa\ex11_02.java

請在C:\myJava\exercise\ch11\pack2>下進行如下執行
C:\myJava\exercise\ch11\pack2>java packa.ex11_02

執行結果
0.5620096068331937 Add 5.129106927139565 = 5.6911165339727585
0.5620096068331937 Sub 5.129106927139565 = -4.567097320306372
0.5620096068331937 Mul 5.129106927139565 = 2.8826073675271173
0.5620096068331937 Div 5.129106927139565 = 0.10957260490309548
log(0.5620096068331937) = -0.2502562606605026
ln(0.5620096068331937) = -0.5762363352253045
sin(5.129106927139565) = 0.7803329408984818
cos(5.129106927139565) = 0.6253642949103558
tan(5.129106927139565) = 1.2478053947904724
